test - package test
 
testCameraPlaneIntersections() - Method in class renderer.CameraIntersectionsIntegrationTests
Test integration of camera and plane intersections for multiple test cases: TC01 - plane perpendicular to view direction, 9 intersections TC02 - plane tilted, all rays intersect, 9 intersections TC03 - steeply angled plane, 6 intersections
testCameraSphereIntersections() - Method in class renderer.CameraIntersectionsIntegrationTests
Test integration of camera and sphere intersections for multiple test cases: TC01 - small sphere, 2 intersections TC02 - large sphere encompassing camera, 18 intersections TC03 - medium sphere intersecting center rays, 10 intersections TC04 - very large sphere, fully covering the view plane, 9 intersections TC05 - sphere behind the camera, 0 intersections
testCameraTriangleIntersections() - Method in class renderer.CameraIntersectionsIntegrationTests
Test integration of camera and triangle intersections for multiple test cases: TC01 - small triangle intersected by 1 ray TC02 - larger triangle intersected by 2 rays

traceRay(Ray) - Method in class renderer.RayTracerBase
 
traceRay(Ray) - Method in class renderer.SimpleRayTracer
Traces a given ray and computes the resulting color at the intersection point.
Triangle - Class in geometries
Represents a triangle in 3D space, defined as a specific case of a polygon with three vertices.
Triangle(Point...) - Constructor for class geometries.Triangle
Constructs a triangle with the specified vertices.
Tube - Class in geometries
Represents an infinite tube in 3D space, defined by a central axis (a ray) and a radius.
Tube(Double, Ray) - Constructor for class geometries.Tube
Constructs a tube with a specified radius and central axis.
